source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several cyclists ride quickly through the intersection, weaving between cars, which is not depicted in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road, with several cyclists riding quickly through the intersection, weaving between cars, and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.
